resources.string:
Jog on treadmill at a comfortable pace for warm-up duration. 

 Complete each exercise back to back. Repeat 3 times. 
 - Barbell Back Squat - 10 to 15 reps 
 - Romanian Deadlifts - 10 to 15 reps 
 - Glute Bridges - 15 - 20 reps 
 - Leg Extensions - 15 - 20 reps 
 - Leg Curl - 15 - 20 reps 

 Walk on the treadmill at a comfortable incline for cool down duration.

Jump rope for 1 minute on and 1 minute off for the duration of your warm up duration. 

 - Push Ups - As many as you can comfortably do. 
 - Lateral Pull Downs (wide grips) - 10 to 15 reps 
 - Chest Press - 10 - 15 reps 
 - Seated Row - 15 - 20 reps 
 - Assisted Pull Ups - 10 - 15 reps 
 - Assisted Dips - 10 - 15 reps 

 Walk on the treadmill at a comfortable incline for cool down duration.

Jog on treadmill at a comfortable pace for warm-up duration. 

 - Jump rope 1 minute on and 1 minute off for 10 minutes. 
 - Walk on stair master on level 3 or 4 for 15 minutes. 

 Walk on the treadmill at a comfortable incline for cool down duration.

Jog on treadmill at a comfortable pace for warm-up duration. 

 Perform each exercise back to back. Repeat 4 times. 
 - Mountain Climbers - 30 
 - Sit Ups - 30 
 - Russian Twists - 30 
 - Leg Raises - 20 
 - Plank 30 seconds - 1 minute 
 

 Walk on the treadmill at a comfortable incline for cool down duration.
Congratulations! You have made it through a week of working out. \n Your rest day should be used for recovery. \n Use this day to stretch out those sore muscles!

Jog on treadmill at a comfortable pace for warm-up duration. 

 - Shoulder Press - 10 to 15 reps 
 - Dumbbell Curls - 15 to 20 reps 
 - Triceps Pushdown - 15 - 20 reps 
 - Lateral Raises to Front Raises - 10 - 15 reps 
 - Dumbbell Hammer Curl - 15 - 20 reps 
 - Dumbbell Overhead triceps Extension - 15 - 20 reps 

 Walk on the treadmill at a comfortable incline for cool down duration.

The 30 Day Fitness app is your guide to living a more active life! 
 This app is meant to supplement a well-balanced diet and help you with your fitness goals.

 Please note, there are no weight suggestions for the listed exercises. It is recommended that you start with a weight that is most comfortable for you. Each week you should either increase your weight or increase the number of reps.

 If you need extra days of rest, TAKE THEM! Just jump back in and pick up where you left off! 

 Please consult with your doctor if you have any medical concerns.

The preferences in this app is used to set your warm-up periods and cool-down periods. 
 You can choose for your warm-up period to be either 5, 7, or 10 minutes with the default being 10 minutes. 
 You can choose for your cool-down period to be either 5, 10, or 15 minutes with the default being 15 minutes. 
 These preferences will be reflected in the daily workouts.
